ED_DecisionText: At its 87th plenary meeting, on 30 June 2023, the General Assembly took note of the Report of the Security Council. (Footnote: Official Records of the General Assembly, Seventy-Seventh Session, Supplement No. 2 (A/77/2).)
ED_Disclaimer: The final version of the text of this decision will be contained in document A/77/49 (Vol. III) after editorial review.
